title: Bold serif with ball terminals (very.co.uk woodmark & Nova Magazine)
content:
I would like some help to identify this font. It's may be custom so any suggestion for similar or a base font would be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052845im_/http:/typophile.com/files/verynova_5520.jpg)
author: Ryuk

comments.content:
This came up before, just the ”very“ as a sample though.  
Now that I see more letters I think it’s customized [ITC Clearface Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317052845/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/itc-clearface/black/).
Thank you vey much Jan for this suggestion. You're probably right. Akira suggested me the same. May be some will have more suggestions... Thanks!
